originalText.text: Going up the floors feels like an endless arts and crafts journey. Enjoyed some caricatures and drawings, many attract by high level of detail and keep you looking. Some rooms feel like an antique shop but not necessarily in a delightful way - got a feeling of disconnection here and there. What I enjoyed the most is discovering a half-hidden room under a black iron spiral staircase. Keep walking through it, pass the bathroom and find yourself in a dark room somewhere in Hogwarts.

text.text: Going up the floors feels like an endless arts and crafts journey. Enjoyed some caricatures and drawings, many attract by high level of detail and keep you looking. Some rooms feel like an antique shop but not necessarily in a delightful way - got a feeling of disconnection here and there. originalText.text: Margo Feiden Galleries not only a gallery, it’s truly an experience. The building itself is a work of art, a preserved time capsule of 19th century architecture and design. The extensive collection of Al Hirschfeld illustrations will keep you wandering for hours, with something new always around the corner. I have never experienced a more welcoming and warm environment in any gallery I’ve visited in the past . It is a must see experience!

text.text: Margo Feiden Galleries not only a gallery, it’s truly an experience. The building itself is a work of art, a preserved time capsule of 19th century architecture and design. originalText.text:
As an ardent fan of the Eighties NBC show, The Golden Girls, I was thrilled to discover that Mr. Hirschfeld created a stunning piece in honour of the four lovely ladies, kept safe and sound and waiting for me at the Margo Feiden Galleries.

I had the honour of purchasing this beloved piece from Margo and her team and it was a pleasure from the beginning. The service was personable and enthusiastic, swift and professional. I couldn't have imagined a more perfect way to purchase my first ever piece of art. I was kept fully informed at every stage, it arrived promptly, immaculately packaged and sealed with love!

It is as if Sofia, Dorothy, Blanche and Rose are sitting here now in my living room!

I live in London, and despite the distance and the online nature of transaction, my experience had the sweetness of a wee purchase from the shop around the corner.

I am so happy!

I hope very much some day to visit this wonderful gallery and meet the lovely Margo herself for coffee and a slice of cheesecake!

originalText.text: The Al Hirschfeld Gallery is an incredible experience. As soon as you walk you're transported into a warm and inviting space filled to the brim by some of Hirschfeld's best works that takes you to the New York of yesteryear. Any fan of Hirschfeld, art or lover of New York City/ Broadway  needs to check out this gallery.

originalText.text: I've been lucky enough to attend a few events at this venue. It's absolutely gorgeous and each event was unique. We all had a blast at each event. The staff was both helpful and super nice and the hosts got to actually be part of the festivities instead of running around taking care of logistics.
